review: In theory I love the ChromeCast and it does work. But there is a lag period and when you move it around to new locations (thus having to sync with different wifi spots) it takes a little time. Every once in awhile I need to reset it too.
author: Ephrata Mom

review: Awesome device!!! Yo can stream from almost ANY device to you TV!!!
author: Roy

review: best little device ever!! simple to use, easy to install, no messy connections or complicated setups... I love it
The micro cable is really flimsy. Easy to replace so it's not a deal breaker. The chromecast itself is awesome.
author: Rachel

review: I would give it a zero if I could. This thing has the worst picture. No matter whwhat device i stream from, the picture freezes or isnt smooth. If i hadn't thrown the box away, I would return it. I have high speed Internet and a great connection. Don't waste your money.
author: Kaitlyn J. Mannon

review: A little trouble with WIFI setup. Had to change channels on my router. I miss support for casting Chrome browser or screen on more Android devices (only 4.4 supported?; Galaxy S4 - OK, Tab S 10.5 - not OK). Otherwise an excellent product.
